title: Spacious, renovated 3rd FL suite with parking near everything
posting_body: This is a recently updated spacious 3rd floor of a multifamily house.
It has a brand new kitchen with a matching island.
The whole apartment has brand new luxurious carpet except for the kitchen area which has brand new flooring.
The entire space has been freshly painted.
There is a dedicated parking space for this apt. and access to a dedicated dryer only.
It has a living room and bedroom and full bathroom.
There is a bus a block away that takes you to downtown and to Case Western and University Hospital

It is located near South Taylor Road and Beechwood Ave. - convenient to The Severance Center Mall which has a post office, banks, Dave's Supermarket, Home Depot, Office Max , Radio Shack, GNC, Subway, Burger King, etc.
Case Western Reserve University, University Hospital, Cleveland Clinic are just a few minutes away.
Macy's, Target and University Shopping Center only 12 blocks away.
Please contact with any questions , to set up an appointment and to send more pics
Walking distance to Coventry area restaurants and shopping.
For additional information,link to photos and to schedule an appointment please contact Lin at
